SUMMARY
Highly accomplished React Native Application    
Developer with 3 years of experience, adept at 
designing and developing intuitive, scalable, and 
high-performance mobile applications for Android 
and iOS platforms. Leveraging expertise in 
seamless UI design, third-party API integration 
and advanced features like Redux and React 
Navigation, I deliver bug-free applications with 
strong platform-specific knowledge, ensuring 
optimal performance and cross-platform 
compatibility.

SANTOSH BALAJI CHAME
React Native Developer
+918805132137
santoshchame24@gmail.com
https://www.linkedin.com/in/santosh-chame-b9990a253
Maharashtra
EXPERIENCE
React Native Developer
ICICI iMobile: Banking App [TCS]
06/2023 
Pune
Designed, developed, and maintained the iMobile Pay app using React 
Native, ensuring a seamless user experience through robust and user-
friendly features, intuitive interfaces, and real-time data integration with 
backend APIs.
Spearheaded testing and debugging efforts, guaranteeing high 
performance, reliability, and security, while providing technical support 
and troubleshooting assistance to ensure smooth app operation and 
safeguarding user data and transactions.
Drove agile development processes, actively participating in sprint 
planning and daily stand-ups, and successfully delivering multiple app 
updates on schedule, resulting in enhanced user experience and app 
performance.
Implemented new features and optimized existing ones, leveraging 
React Native's capabilities to increase user engagement by 25% and 
reduce crash rates by 15% through rigorous testing and continuous 
integration practices over a six-month period.
React Native Developer
Hdfc MobileBanking App [TCS]
02/2022 - 05/2023 
Pune
Developed and maintained HDFC Bank's mobile banking application 
using React Native, enhancing user interface and experience through 
iterative design and implementation.
Integrated backend APIs to deliver seamless functionality and data 
retrieval, and conducted thorough testing to ensure robustness.
Contributed to agile development sprints, leading the implementation of 
key features that improved user engagement and retention metrics, 
resulting in a 25% increase in user retention rates over six months.
Optimized app performance, reducing load time by 20% and ensuring 
cross-platform compatibility.
Successfully resolved critical bugs and issues, resulting in a smoother 
user experience and higher client satisfaction ratings.
EDUCATION

- Android Studio
